Add a shoryouken button to the project

In the conversation, the user engaged with the AI assistant to implement various features in their application, primarily involving the addition of buttons for functions related to trading toilet paper. The user requested the addition of a "Shoryouken" button, with the AI confirming it would be added, following up with questions about its placement and functionality. The user consistently requested the inclusion of a "Hadoken" button as well, to which the AI repeatedly acknowledged their request and asked similar clarifying questions. 

The user also expressed a desire for other features, which the AI presented in lists, including customizable user profiles, real-time inventory updates, an in-app messaging system, email forms for contacting Santa, and various user feedback options. Features like a "Live chat support" and "Secure payment gateway integration" were frequently highlighted. The AI acknowledged each request and confirmed the implementation of additional features such as a contact form for users to reach out to Santa and various user customization options.

In summary, the user and AI collaborated on enhancing an app, with multiple iterations and confirmations regarding the features they desired to implement, ensuring a user-friendly experience with fun, interactive elements.
